summary: This little mod adds the Axe of Disintegration, enabling the Dragonborn to make dead bodies explode. It\'s obtainable at the tree stump next to the Riverwood bridge.
descriptionHtml:
From the creator of Decompose Corpse spell for Oblivion and Zap-Away! gun for Fallout 3 comes the Axe of Disintegration.

Why let the corpses to lay around aimlessly when you can make them explode and disappear!
Just swing this harmless to the living beings axe at the nearest corpse and watch it ignite and explode!

Demo (with scroll usage):
[youtube]BAvnrf3DmIk[/youtube]

How does it work?:
It adds the Axe of Disintegration to the Riverwood exterior. It can be found right next to the bridge on a tree stump.
This axe is enchanted and doesn\'t need any recharges. It doesn\'t do any damage and makes dead bodies disappear instantly.

Legal:
You may use this mod in any of your mod/compilation, just add me to the credits and PM me with info.
If you want to modificate this mod - the procedure is the same.

-MCaleb

PS: Also avalaible on Steam:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9349
author: MCaleb
